summary: A little HD retexture for the imperial sword, textures are 20148x2048.
descriptionHtml:
First of all, I'm french so please forgive me if my english sucks :)

The original texture of the imperial sword look so ugly in my opinion and I didn't find a retexture good enough for me.
So I made this mod, it's a little HD retexture for the imperial sword, textures are 2048x2048
The textures are new ones, not the upscaled original texture.


[IMG]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7175/13802137945_6038e0daf1_c.jpg[/IMG]

Files :

- An optional darker version of the sword if you think the main texture si too bright, use this optional texture if you use a bright ENB (I use Project ENB in my screens)

- A little retexture of the scabbard in 1024x1024

Installation :

-Just put the "weapons" directory into your skyrim textures folder, located in the data folder, if you don't have a textures folder just create one .

Compatibility :

This mod is compatible with everything, except mods that retexture this sword.


Leave an endorse if you liked the mod :) .
author: KinderBueno
